brand_info.name: On
brand_info.positioning: Swiss-engineered performance sportswear brand positioned at the premium end of the market, combining technical innovation, distinctive design, and a culture of movement.
brand_info.mission: Ignite the human spirit through movement.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 2010 in Zürich, Switzerland by Olivier Bernhard, David Allemann, and Caspar Coppetti with the goal of revolutionizing the sensation of running through a new cushioning concept that led to CloudTec.

core_values: Human movement as a positive force
brand_values.brand_promise: A distinct running and movement experience built on technical innovation and Swiss engineering, expressed through modern design and premium feel.
differentiators: Signature CloudTec cushioning language and technology platform expressed as 'Run on clouds'.
A premium, design-forward performance brand that bridges sport, lifestyle, and fashion through collaborations and cultural storytelling.

Recognizable campaign platforms and collaborations that expand the meaning of movement beyond competition, including Dream On, Soft Wins, Zone Dreamers, LOEWE x On, THE ROGER, Cyclon, CleanCloud, LightSpray, and Cloudsurfer launch stories.
non_negotiables: Do not compromise technical credibility: performance innovation must remain central.
Maintain premium, Swiss-engineered perception through precision in design, materials, and communication.
Keep brand language optimistic and movement-led: campaigns must connect movement to human spirit, confidence, and community.
Protect icon assets: On wordmark, CloudTec sole language, and clean industrial design cues must remain legible and consistent.

psychographics.lifestyle: Performance-driven and design-aware consumers who move across running, training, tennis, and everyday active lifestyles, and appreciate premium product storytelling.
psychographics.behavior: Research-led purchasing, technology curiosity, interest in collaborations and limited drops, preference for clean silhouettes and versatile performance pieces.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Short, uplifting, movement-led statements supported by simple, confident product truths and a Swiss-engineering undercurrent.
preferred_structures: Campaign platform headline plus a single supporting claim
avoid: Overly technical jargon without human meaning
Discount-led language as the primary hook
tone_dos: Anchor narratives in movement, community, and human potential
Let product innovation feel tangible and credible
Use aspirational lines that invite participation

logo.primary_logo: On wordmark, typically black or white depending on contrast needs.
logo.usage_rules: Use high-contrast placement on calm backgrounds; keep the mark crisp and unwarped; avoid placing over busy textures without a contrast buffer.
logo.lockup_behavior: Often minimal and functional: top corner or bottom corner anchoring; secondary lockups may appear in collaboration contexts while keeping On legible.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'O' around the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Neutral technical palette as default; collaboration and campaign worlds may introduce accent color, but overall feel remains clean, premium, and controlled.

typography.primary_font: Modern sans-serif with a technical, editorial feel
typography.secondary_font: Condensed or bold sans for short headlines and campaign tags when needed

layout_principles.grid_system: Minimal modular grid with strong margins and clean alignment
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-led with sparse copy; technology pages add structured microcopy
layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower third or bottom edge; clear and minimal
layout_principles.alignment: Centered hero subjects or clean off-center compositions; product silhouettes remain unobstructed

preferred_photographers: Campaign-specific directors and photographers in a cinematic-commercial style for Dream On and Zone Dreamers.
Fashion-collaboration photographers with crisp editorial execution for LOEWE x On.
Performance product photographers with clean studio lighting for technology and footwear storytelling.
style.camera_feel: Modern and premium with crisp clarity, restrained styling, and occasional cinematic narrative moments that emphasize togetherness and confidence.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural athletic movement, relaxed confidence, and togetherness in group scenes; avoid strained intensity poses as the default tone.
style.casting_attitude: Performance athletes plus culturally relevant talent; inclusive, modern, and confident without arrogance.

technical.lighting: Clean studio lighting for product and technology clarity; soft daylight or controlled cinematic lighting for narrative campaigns.
technical.contrast: Medium; clean blacks and whites with precise tonal control.
technical.grain: Low to subtle; premium digital finish.
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; shallow DOF for portrait and narrative beats, deeper focus for product and tech explainers.
technical.color_grading: Neutral modern grading with controlled highlights; collaboration campaigns may introduce curated accents while keeping the base palette clean.

preferred_locations: Minimal studio sets for product and technology
Urban movement environments with clean architecture
Natural landscapes tied to alpine or outdoor heritage
Cinematic sets for platform campaigns and collaborations
contexts: Movement as a daily ritual and human unlock
Premium product innovation and material storytelling

model_casting.diversity: Broad representation across sport and culture
model_casting.attitude: Focused, warm, and confident; collective energy when in groups; individual calm when solo

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Technology and silhouette clarity are prioritized; footwear must read instantly through sole language and clean profile.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Technical minimalism as baseline; fashion elevation in collaborations; always keep functionality believable.
avoid: Overcrowded styling that hides product silhouette
Messy backgrounds that reduce premium perception
Overly aggressive sports tropes as the only story

motion_rules.pacing: Controlled energy; smooth movement beats; readable product moments; cinematic pacing in platform campaigns.
motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts and minimal graphic overlays; occasional film-trailer language for cinematic campaigns.

visual_dos: Keep layouts clean with generous whitespace and crisp alignment
Use calm, premium lighting and controlled palettes
Show movement as confidence and connection, not only intensity
visual_donts: Cluttered compositions that dilute premium feel
Overly loud graphics that fight the product
Generic sports grit aesthetics as the default
copy_dos: Use short, uplifting lines tied to movement and human spirit
Explain innovation in simple, credible terms
Keep collaboration naming precise and clear

must_remain: Technology-forward narrative anchored in CloudTec and innovation language
Optimistic movement platform language consistent with Dream On
test_zone: Experimental film-language campaigns and new storytelling formats
Advanced material and manufacturing stories as creative drivers
New movement communities beyond running while preserving performance credibility

materials: Minimal signage with strong product focus
interactive_elements: Product try-on and gait or movement education moments
Campaign screens with calm, premium video loops
retail.soundscape: Modern, calm-upbeat electronic and indie-pop with a premium retail feel

digital.tone_adjustment: Minimal, clear copy with strong visuals and structured technology storytelling

platform_behavior.Instagram: Campaign platforms, collaboration drops, athlete and community movement moments, premium product close-ups
platform_behavior.Website: Technology explainers, product-first navigation, campaign modules that remain clean and readable
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Short headlines, curated product stories, collaboration announcements

print.paper: Premium coated or uncoated stock with minimal layouts
print.cover_rules: Strong hero image; minimal headline; logo anchored with high contrast and generous margins

logo_misuse_examples: Low-contrast wordmark on mid-grey backgrounds without a buffer
Placing the logo over busy shoe textures without contrast control
Over-layering with graphics that reduce product silhouette clarity
